## Hey, Welcome!!
 I am a PhD candidate in *Economics* at *Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi*, and serve as an *Assistant Professor* at *Ranchi University, Ranchi (Jharkhand)*. Passionate about advancing economic research, my work primarily focuses on education, while I remain open to exploring diverse areas within the field of economics.
